name: BI Senior Developer
description:
VTB Group’s Corporate Investment Business is a leader in the international investment banking sector in Russia. VTB Capital has achieved significant results since it was founded in 2008 and has carved out a reputation of a reliable business partner for clients from around the world. VTB Capital operates in London, Hong Kong, Singapore, Zug, Frankfurt am Main, Sofia and Vienna, with headquarters in Moscow.

Job Summary

The BI Senior Developer at the BI department is responsible for the daily supervision of the below tasks and responsibilities. He/she will report directly to the Head of BI Division.

BI Senior Developer

He/she delivers, maintains and supports BI solutions as well as In-house development of solutions from the platform/database perspective. This includes the following activities:

  • Support BI activities (local, SE, Group) related to the database and ETL functionality
  • Enhancing and reengineering current Meta/Data Models
  • Enhancing and reengineering current ETL solutions
  • Provision of BI-related end user computing facilities
  • Code review for both in-house and outsourced BI developers
  • Coaching for both in-house and outsourced BI developers

Responsibilities

  • Delivery of key and operational tasks assigned by the Head of BI Division
  • Provide ad-hoc support on production applications
  • Basing on logical diagrams provided by analysts design and maintain detail layer model
  • Basing on reporting requirements design and maintain datamarts models
  • Operational support for local and SE data warehouse
  • Provide BI knowledge and support to all members of SE
  • Liaise with Business & IT on BI issues and assist in solution definition
  • Testing of new BI solutions as well as testing of their own work
  • Operational support and development of ETL processes with PowerShell and Python
  • Operational support and new development of ETL scheduling with ActiveBatch
  • Review current ETL framework and middleware used and provide advices and recommendations on enhancing current flows
  • Provide input in code review and code review of other deliverables
Key competences&qualifications
  • Minimum of Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or Technical Science or similar education
  • Professional certifications is a plus
  • Open minded attitude
  • Organize, arrange, balance and manage the personal workload
  • Minimum of Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or Technical Science or similar
  • Good general IT knowledge and experience (> 5 years)
  • Effective business communication to identify needs, manage the expectations and in-crease the satisfaction with the BI solutions offered
  • Working Experience in a bank (> 18 months )
  • Profound functional know-how of Banking Applications in general and BI solutions specifically
  • General knowledge and working experience in all IT areas
  • Practical experience with, SVN or any other version controlling tools
  • > 3 years of database development experience: SQL-Server, Oracle
  • ER tools (like ERWin or Oracle Data modeler) professional proficiency
  • Good knowledge in scripting languages like PowerShell and Python
  • ETL knowledge > 3 years
  • Experience in working with JIRA and Confluence would be a plus
  • Ability to handle separate tasks simultaneously
  • Sensibility regarding working in a multi-cultural international environment
  • Excellent oral and written communication English. German would be a benefit

Benefit package

  • Official employment
  • Competitive salary
  • Professional training and development
  • Voluntary medical insurance for employee and their family members, life and health insurance, banking products on attractive terms
  • Sport and corporate events
  • Ability to build your career in the leading Russian investment bank
